703141f-a.text:
Beard Street, south side, between Richard and Otsego Streets.
At the left is a view of one of the many buildings of the Robin Dry Dock and Repair Co. June 6, 1931. P.L. Sperr. No Reproductions.

Note: the business name is sometimes spelled Robbins or Robins (always with an 'S'). Not sure of correct spelling, but this caption may have it wrong.
Submitted by Carolina Salguero, PortSide NewYork, www.portsidenewyork.org, portsidenewyork@gmail.com
703141f-a.folder: Beard Street & Richard Street, Brooklyn, NY
